author: Staff Reporter
text:
M. Paneerselvam (54), a painter from Sanganur, who suffered injuries while at work on December 21, died at Coimbatore Medical College Hospital on Saturday.

He fell down from temporary scaffolding while working in a building at NGP Nagar in Cheran Maa Nagar and sustained injuries to his neck and spine.

The Peelamedu police have registered a case under section 304(A) (causing death by negligence) of the Indian Penal Code.

Worker electrocuted

V. Kalaimani (53), a construction worker from Machampalayam in Sundarapuram, was electrocuted while at work in a hospital on Madukkarai Road in Sundarapuram on Thursday. Police sources said that he fell down from the first floor of the building, touched a live wire and suffered electric shock. He was admitted to CMCH, where he died on Saturday.
title: Man dies of injuries
